entry.title: Thursday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning early this morning then changing to rain or drizzle this morning and ending this afternoon. Fog patches late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:34 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:34 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
